sentences.en: CHANGING TIME AND VARYING ART " - The changes of contemporary Chinese brush stroke figural paintings "
sentences.cn: “ 时运交移,质文代变 ” —— 当代工笔人物画表现方法的变迁.

sentences.en: The Congo people decorate their pipes with figural and geometric patterns.
sentences.cn: 刚果人民用几和形状的样式装饰他们的烟斗.

sentences.en: These are the figural representations contained in ancient wall painting.
sentences.cn: 这些都是古代壁画中的人物画像.

sentences.en: What are the distinctions between figural and metric structures?
sentences.cn: 在音形和节拍的结构间的差异是什么?
